concept.title: Ideas
concept.shortdesc: In many organizations, the person who manages Target receives ideas from other people. To enable ideas to be gathered and managed in one location, the Ideas list eliminates the need to manage ideas in email or spreadsheets.

conbody.p: There are two ways to change the order of items in the ideas queue. You can type a number in the order box when you create or edit an idea. You can also drag an idea and drop it into the desired place in the queue.
